,if(b.id is null,'false','true') as checked
FROM tb_pages a
LEFT JOIN tb_role_page_mapping b on a.PAGEID=b.pageid and b.roleid=#{roleid}
WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.active = 1 order by a.pagegroup,a.pagelevel,a.pageorder
